title: New: Future Islands – Seasons (Waiting On You)
body:
Nothing quite makes a Tuesday worth working through than a new Future Islands track and video.

Taken from their recently announced ‘Singles’ album set to be released on 4AD on the 24th March, ‘Seasons (Waiting On You)’ is Future Islands at their best with vocalist Samuel T. Herring passionately belting out each line with his own trademark ferocity.

The video itself is directed by long time collaborater Jay Buim, and focuses on the lives of a rural, cowboy community, looking in on the moments of calm reflection and counterbalanced by the energy and life that is infused in their environment and the relationships they hold.

Touring later this year, you can catch Future Islands at one of the following dates –

07 London, Electric Ballroom

08 Manchester, Sound Control

10 Brighton, The Great Escape
